name: Wibble (itch)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2017 #GGJ17


Wibble is a skipping rope sportsball simulation, first to 13 points win!

Keyboard:
P1 - W / S,
P2 - Up / Down
R - Restart

Analogue controller:
Each player uses one analogue stick.
Any face button to restart.

T restarts and toggles between two rope modes that I am experimenting with, not sure which one works better.

------------------------

I was fascinated by the phenomenon of the wobbly rope, built that, and looked for a game in that, didn't really have an end goal at the start.

Wanted to work in a small team for this GGJ, but the core idea I had was so small that I could do practically everything myself, so ended up doing so. Was still amazing to have the support of everyone else on-site, as well as to give input and assist to whoever I could.

Thanks ya'll for a cool #GGJ17 :)

------------------------
